QuestData.Title: Honor the Dying
QuestData.Description: Their elite warriors are ruthless... so... powerful.$B$B<Caza'rez spits up blood.>$B$BYou have to kill them... or we will never defeat Kargath...
QuestData.LogDescription: Caza'rez inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel wants you to kill 4 Shattered Hand Legionnaires, 2 Shattered Hand Centurions, and 2 Shattered Hand Champions.
